mapper.select:
select s.department_id, d.department_name, s.pf_id, pf.pf_name
from subject s join department d on d.department_id = s.department_id join pf on pf.pf_id = s.pf_id; select * from st;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject( course_id, pf_id, department_id, course_name, grade, semester, credit, course_division, course_day, course_start_time, course_end_time, limit_max_count ) VALUES( #{course_id}, #{pfId}, #{deptId}, #{deptName}, #{grade}, #{semester}, #{credit}, #{course_division}, #{course_day}, #{course_start_time}, #{course_end_time}, #{limit_max_count} )
